Achievements.Name: Score a 50 in Slam Dunk Contest
Achievements.Description: Score a 50 in a slam dunk contest

Achievements.Name: 28 pts in 3Pt Contest
Achievements.Description: Score 28 or more out of 30 in a 3pt contest.

Achievements.Name: Superstar Slam Dunk Champion
Achievements.Description: Win the Slam Dunk Contest vs. the CPU on Superstar difficulty level.

Achievements.Name: Superstar 3PT Champion
Achievements.Description: Win the 3PT Shootout vs. the CPU on Superstar difficulty level.

Achievements.Name: Two 30's
Achievements.Description: Have two players in your team score at least 30 points in a solo game vs. the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Blocking fest
Achievements.Description: Have your team block 15 shots in a solo game vs. the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Offensive Rebounds galore
Achievements.Description: Have your team grab 20 offensive rebounds in a solo game vs. the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Defensive Rebounds galore
Achievements.Description: Have your team grab 30 defensive rebounds in a solo game vs. the CPU.

Achievements.Name: 3â€™s in the practice arena
Achievements.Description: Score 5 straight 3â€™s in the practice arena.

Achievements.Name: The underdog
Achievements.Description: Pick the lowest rated NBA team and win vs. the CPU as the highest rated team (no special teams).

Achievements.Name: Hot shooting streak
Achievements.Description: Make five 3 pointers in a row with the same player during a solo game vs. the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Trivia King
Achievements.Description: Correctly answer a minimum of 3 questions during a single trivia mini-game.

Achievements.Name: Double Double
Achievements.Description: Have one of your players get a Double Double in a solo game against the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Triple Double
Achievements.Description: Have one of your players get a Triple Double in a solo game against the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Quadruple Double
Achievements.Description: Have one of your players get a Quadruple Double in a solo game against the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Shoot 100% Free Throws
Achievements.Description: Have your team shoot 100% from the free throw line in a solo game against the CPU (minimum 10 shots)

Achievements.Name: Win it Inside
Achievements.Description: Win without making a 3 pointer in a solo game against the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Scoring individual record
Achievements.Description: Have one player score at least 101 points in a solo game against the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Steals individual record
Achievements.Description: Have one player get at least 12 steals in a solo game against the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Blocks individual record
Achievements.Description: Have one player get at least 18 blocks in a solo game against the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Assists individual record
Achievements.Description: Have one player get at least 31 Assists in a solo game against the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Rebounds individual record
Achievements.Description: Have one player get at least 56 Rebounds in a solo game against the CPU.

Achievements.Name: Dream Lineup in Dynasty
Achievements.Description: Have 3 players with an overall rating of 90 or more on your Dynasty roster.

Achievements.Name: Best regular season record
Achievements.Description: Finish a Dynasty Modeâ„¢ season with the best record in the NBA.

Achievements.Name: Win a Dynasty championship
Achievements.Description: Win a championship in Dynasty Modeâ„¢

Achievements.Name: Win 10 Dynasty championships
Achievements.Description: Win 10 championships in the span of 25 years in Dynasty Modeâ„¢
